title: Remove shoe names and add 7 more product images

requirements.text: Remove the shoe name text (e.g., 'Adidas Ultraboost', 'Nike Air Max') from all shoe cards in the gallery display while keeping the images visible
acceptanceCriteria: Shoe cards display only images without any product name text
Card layout and styling remain consistent with current luxury design
Hover effects and other card interactions continue to work

requirements.text: Add 7 additional men's branded shoe product images to the gallery, maintaining the current luxury aesthetic and 2-column grid layout

quotes: add more pics of shoes ....... about 7 more pics

acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays a total of 12 shoe images (5 existing + 7 new)
New shoe images feature various men's branded footwear styles
2-column grid layout adapts to accommodate all 12 images
All images maintain consistent styling and hover effects

constraints: Maintain the current luxury design theme with gold accents
Preserve all hover effects and card interactions
nonGoals: Adding shoe names or descriptions back
Changing the overall page layout or other sections
